newReservation.kvkkConsent: I have read and accept the Personal Data Protection Law terms.
newReservation.kvkkText:
**PRIVACY POLICY**

**1. Data Controller**
At Royal Coiffeur, we place great importance on the protection and confidentiality of your personal data. Therefore, we inform you about the processing of your personal data in accordance with the Swiss Data Protection Act (DSG) and, where applicable, the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

**2. Collection and Processing of Personal Data**
We collect and process the following personal data:
- First name, last name
- Email address
- Phone number
- IP address and browser information
- Website usage data (cookies)

**3. Purpose of Processing Personal Data**
Your personal data is processed for the following purposes:
- Provision and optimization of our services
- Compliance with legal obligations
- Marketing and communication measures
- Improvement of user experience

**4. Disclosure of Personal Data**
Your personal data may be shared with the following third parties in compliance with legal regulations:
- Authorities and public institutions in Switzerland
- Service providers and partner companies
- IT service providers and hosting providers

**5. Transfer Abroad**
If the transfer of personal data to countries outside Switzerland is necessary, we ensure that legal requirements are met, particularly through the conclusion of appropriate data protection agreements.

**6. Retention Period**
Personal data is only stored as long as necessary for the respective purposes or as required by legal retention obligations.

**7. Your Rights**
In accordance with the DSG and, where applicable, the GDPR, you have the following rights:
- Right to access your stored data
- Right to correct inaccurate data
- Right to delete your data
- Right to restrict processing
- Right to object to data processing

Please direct inquiries to info@royalcoiffeur.ch.

**8. Cookies and Tracking Technologies**
Our website uses cookies to analyze and improve user experience. Details can be found in our cookie policy.

**9. Changes to the Privacy Policy**
We reserve the right to update this privacy policy as needed. Please review it regularly.

**10. Contact**
If you have any questions, you can reach us at 081 558 84 56.

about.title: About Us
about.description1: Our experienced team of stylists and colorists specializes in giving you the perfect look. With years of experience and continuous training, we are always up to date with the latest hairstyle trends.
about.description2: We place great importance on individual consultation and cater to your personal wishes to ensure that you leave our salon with a radiant smile.

1.title: Modern Styling

3.title: Color Expertise

4.title: Luxury Treatment

5.title: Trending Styles

6.title: Expert Care
6.description: Professional care for healthy, beautiful hair
